Admission & Aid

Your summer vacation is an ideal time to visit Whitman. We invite you to come take a tour and get a feel for campus life!

Financial Aid

We offer campus tours all year. And if you visit during the academic year, you'll have the option to sit in on a class and stay overnight in a residence hall.
